name: elrabd
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1)), wcel(c0, c1), w2)
stmt.pretty: sylanbrc(w0, c0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w1 }, c0 ∈ c1, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, w2)
-| wb(wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, w2)
-| wb(wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, crab(s0, c1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, w2)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

comment: Membership in a restricted class abstraction, using implicit substitution. Deduction version of ~ elrab . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
